prompt.content: Compare Macy's Inc. (NYSE: M) adjusted EBITDA as a percent of total revenue in FY 2025 (ended Feb 1st, 2025), against guidance in Q2 2024 after adjusting for delivery expense. Use the midpoint value and report it as % BEAT or MISS (rounded to two decimal points).

messages.content: [{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Final answer contains the numeric percentage 0.14%"},{"criteria":"Final answer percentage value is presented rounded to two decimal places (0.14%)","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Final answer includes the label 'BEAT' indicating the result is a beat rather than a miss"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Retrieves adjusted EBITDA as $1977 million"},{"criteria":"Retrieves total revenue as $23,006 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Calculates adjusted EBITDA margin as 8.59%","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Retrieves FY 2025 adjusted EBITDA margin guidance (excluding delivery expense) from the Q2 2024 earnings materials as 8.2%â€“8.7%","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculates midpoint of guidance values as 8.45%"}]
